issue.title: [CF 1330] Show dot strength icon not working with german client
issue.body:
Hi and sry for bothering again.

I was creating an icon which should be shown when my dot is under a certain value. Like you told me i should use "Debuff - Tooltip Number #1" as condition. I did it but it still wont work and i was wondering about why yours is working while mine is not. So is switched my language from german to english and itÂ´s working as intended.
With the english client it can read the value set in "Debuff - Tooltip Number #1" correctly( it seems also to count the amount of combo points i was using) and disappears if the value is exceeded. If i am using my german client it seems only to count the amount of combo points i was using and thats it but it cant read the value of the strength of the dot. Maybe its working with other languages as well as my german client.

I dont know it this kind is work as intended and/or not fixable with other language based clients. I was also testing it on Rogue and Moonkin and it works like described above.

These are the icons with i was testing it. I named them "ENG"  for english and "GER" for german.Also "Zerfetzen" is the german word for "Rip".

ENG:

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFTOOLTIPSCAN1 ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S< ^SUnit^Starget ^SLevel^N5000 ^SName^SRip ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SShowTTText^B ^SName^SRip ^SEnabled^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^SENG ^t^t^t^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N82008^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

GER:

^1^T^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SDEBUFFTOOLTIPSCAN1 ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S< ^SUnit^Starget ^SLevel^N5000 ^SName^SZerfetzen ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SShowTTText^B ^SName^SZerfetzen ^SEnabled^B ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^SGER ^t^t^t^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N2^T ^SAlpha^N1 ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N82008^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

I also did some screenshots of it and hope that you get what i mean cause my english is not the best.
The number 1 and 3 on the icons in the screenshot are the combo points i was spending for this spell at the time.


> Posted by CurseForge user Mindfork | Imported from CurseForge issue #1330 | Raw

Should be working in g2cd8bb9: https://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/files/

You'll want to use #2 instead of #1 for the German client, since the damage is the second number in the tooltip instead of the first like it is for English.

Edited Oct 28, 2016

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
